ItemTooltips.stout_shield: Helps you as a melee hero.
ItemTooltips.magic_wand: One of the best item in early game that will save the day again and again.
ItemTooltips.travel_boots: A very usefull boots for late game, frees a TP slot and allows you to do combo "Buyback-TP in fight".
ItemTooltips.power_treads: Switch to str against strong casters, to agi for farm and to int when you cast spells.
ItemTooltips.hand_of_midas: Try to get it untill 10 min.
ItemTooltips.poor_mans_shield: Better laning against agressive range heroes.
ItemTooltips.heart: Fat clones of a big demon.
ItemTooltips.black_king_bar: An item that every carrier need for good teamfights.
ItemTooltips.sphere: Prevents initiation on you, like batrider's lasso.
ItemTooltips.radiance: Your illusions can very quickly farm woods with it.
ItemTooltips.butterfly: Even stronger illusions, even more survivality and DPS. Best option for agi-carry.
ItemTooltips.greater_crit: One of the best options for damage dealers. Go for it instead of skadi if you need damage.
ItemTooltips.manta: Debuffs things, can save you from focus and increases your push potential as well.
ItemTooltips.invis_sword: Make neutrals hit you under 10% hp...
ItemTooltips.sange_and_yasha: If you are snowballing or simple don't like Manta.
ItemTooltips.satanic: Time to upgrade our Helm and become an immortal demon.
ItemTooltips.skadi: Gives all what TB need and strongly improves illusions.
ItemTooltips.helm_of_the_dominator: Allows you to always be on full hp at farming and also you can pretty easy clean ancient stacks with it.
ItemTooltips.yasha: Great synergy with TB attack and movespeed, also can be upgraded further.

AbilityTooltips.terrorblade_reflection: Slow at any level always will be 60% @ 5 sec, so get it once and use on their main-carry further.
AbilityTooltips.terrorblade_conjure_image: If you press it in range form, illusions will be range also.
AbilityTooltips.terrorblade_metamorphosis: Your bread and butter, max it ASAP and use wisely.
AbilityTooltips.terrorblade_sunder: Only 250 range, be careful and use it on closest target to you. Can save allies as well.
